problem_text_cn: 如图,用长为3m的竹竿测量旗杆的高度,使竹竿、旗杆的影子落在地面的同一点．竹竿与这一点相距8m、与旗杆相距24m,旗杆的高为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, use a bamboo pole with a length of N_0 to measure the height of the flag pole, so that the shadow of the pole and the flag pole fall on the same point on the ground. The bamboo pole is N_1 from this point and N_2 from the flag pole, the height of the flag pole is ()
raw_answer:
解:由图可知:
设旗杆的高度为x米,\frac{竹竿高}{竹竿影长}=\frac{旗杆高}{旗杆影长},\frac{3}{8}=\frac{x}{8+24}
解得x=12．
故选:C．
